Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.authenticator.impl

Class SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.authenticator.impl.SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISmintIoAuthenticator
public class SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl extends Object implements ISmintIoAuthenticator
Authenticator to refresh access token (=authorization) with Smint.io API.

General authenticator uses the refresh token to renew the validity of the access token. See article Refreshing an access token for some explanation, how refreshing the access token is performed.

    OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT

  • Field Details

    • OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT

      public static final String OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT
      The URL to the Smint.ip API OAuth token end point that is used to refresh the OAuth access token.

      the placeholder {0} is replaced with the tenant ID, fetched from ISettingsModel#getTenantId(). MessageFormat.format(String, Object...) is used to fill the placeholder. 

       OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT = "https://{0}.smint.io/connect/token"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl

      @Inject public SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl(Provider<okhttp3.OkHttpClient> httpClientProvider)

  • Method Details

    • refreshSmintIoToken

      public SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl refreshSmintIoToken(ISettingsModel settings, IAuthTokenStorage authTokenStorage) throws SmintIoAuthenticatorException
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoAuthenticator
      Renew the validity of the OAuth access token utilizing the refresh token.
      Specified by:
      refreshSmintIoToken in interface ISmintIoAuthenticator
      Parameters:
      settings - The settings that contains the OAuth redirection URL and other invariant configuration data that might be necessary.
      authTokenStorage - a storage provider to read the current OAuth access token and refresh token and then make new tokens persistent for next use.
      Returns:
      this for Fluent Interface design.
      Throws:
      SmintIoAuthenticatorException - in case no refresh token is available, invalid, has expired or the Smint.io API rejected the refresh token.

    • getHttpClientProvider

      public Provider<okhttp3.OkHttpClient> getHttpClientProvider()
      Provides the OkHttpClient provider, internally used.
      Returns:
      the provider or null if none has been set.

    • getHttpClient

      public okhttp3.OkHttpClient getHttpClient()
      Provides the OkHttpClient internally used, fetched from the provider getHttpClientProvider().
      Returns:
      the OkHttpClient or null if the provider has not been set or did not provide a value.

    • validateForTokenRefresh

      public static void validateForTokenRefresh(IAuthTokenModel authData) throws SmintIoAuthenticatorException
      Validates the available OAuth data for refreshing access token.

      Validates that a refresh token is available.

      Parameters:
      authData - the OAuth data to validate.
      Throws:
      SmintIoAuthenticatorException - in case no refresh token is available.
